title: Spiced Cranberry Sauce
markdown:
### Summary

Nathan,

This recipe was made specifically for my Christmas orange yule log but I think that it can add a warmth to any type of desert that your heart desires. I love you dearly.

Mom

### Ingredients

* 12oz fresh or frozen cranberries
* 1 ¾ cups sugar
* ½ cup water
* ½ teaspoon cinnamon
* ½ teaspoon ground allspice
* ⅛ teaspoon salt
* ⅛ teaspoon ground ginger
* ⅛ teaspoon ground cloves
### Preparation

* PIn a large saucepan combine all ingredients and bring to a boil
* Reduce heat; simmer uncovered until the berries pop and the mixture is thickened, about 30 min
* Cool and transfer to a covered container and refrigerate until chilled
